iacDescription.issue: Defining a Load balancer Service without setting the loadBalancerSourceRanges property will use the default value of 0.0.0.0/0.
iacDescription.impact: This allows access to any traffic to the Node Security Group(s), potentially meaning everyone can access your service.
iacDescription.resolve: Set `loadBalancerSourceRanges` attribute value to specific IP addresses

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Updating the `cidr_block` attribute with a more restrictive IP range or a specific IP address to ensure traffic can only reach known destinations.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That traffic from a resource could reach any destination, in the event of a breach this means data could be uploaded externally or additional resources targeted
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: That outbound traffic is not restricted to a specific range from a resource
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Default VPC Security Group allows open egress

iacDescription.issue: That outbound traffic is not restricted to a specific range from a resource
iacDescription.impact: That traffic from a resource could reach any destination, in the event of a breach this means data could be uploaded externally or additional resources targeted
iacDescription.resolve: Updating the `cidr_block` attribute with a more restrictive IP range or a specific IP address to ensure traffic can only reach known destinations.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Updating the `cidr_block` attribute with a more restrictive IP range or a specific IP address to ensure traffic can only come from known sources.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That potentially everyone can access your resource
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: That inbound traffic is allowed to a resource from any source instead of a restricted range
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Default VPC Security Group allows open ingress

iacDescription.issue: That inbound traffic is allowed to a resource from any source instead of a restricted range
iacDescription.impact: That potentially everyone can access your resource
iacDescription.resolve: Updating the `cidr_block` attribute with a more restrictive IP range or a specific IP address to ensure traffic can only come from known sources.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `cidr_block` attribute with a more restrictive IP, for example `192.16.0.0/24`
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That potentially everyone can access your resource

remediation.cloudformation: Set `Properties.SecurityGroupIngress.CidrIp` attribute with a more restrictive IP, for example `192.16.0.0/24`
remediation.terraform: Set `cidr_block` attribute with a more restrictive IP, for example `192.16.0.0/24`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: That inbound traffic is allowed to a resource from any source instead of a restricted range
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Security Group allows open ingress
